brand_info.name: Nestlé
brand_info.positioning: The world’s largest food and beverage company, positioned as a science-based nutrition, health, and wellness leader serving consumers across all life stages.
brand_info.vision: To be the leading Nutrition, Health and Wellness company, enhancing quality of life and contributing to a healthier future.
brand_info.mission: Enhance quality of life and contribute to a healthier future by providing nutritious, high-quality, safe food and beverages.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1866 in Vevey, Switzerland by Henri Nestlé with the invention of an infant cereal to address malnutrition, Nestlé evolved into a global food and beverage group built on nutrition science and scale.

brand_values.brand_promise: Provide food and beverages that are safe, nutritious, and enjoyable while supporting healthier lives and sustainable systems.
differentiators: Unmatched global scale across categories and geographies.
Strong integration of nutrition science and R&D.
Portfolio spanning everyday nutrition, indulgence, and specialized health products.
Long-term commitment to sustainability and Creating Shared Value.
non_negotiables: Product safety and quality standards must never be compromised.
Science-based claims and regulatory compliance are mandatory.
Sustainability and responsibility must be embedded across operations.
Trust and transparency must be preserved at all touchpoints.

psychographics.lifestyle: Consumers seeking convenient, trustworthy food and beverage solutions aligned with health, wellbeing, and everyday life.
psychographics.behavior: Routine purchasing across categories, reliance on trusted household brands, increasing interest in nutrition transparency and sustainability.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Clear, reassuring, and evidence-based, balancing scientific credibility with accessible human language.

logo.primary_logo: Nestlé wordmark with bird’s nest symbol.
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clarity and respect clear space; avoid distortion or decorative effects.
logo.lockup_behavior: Corporate logo used consistently across markets; sub-brands may appear with endorsement.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the 'N' in the wordmark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Clean, trustworthy palette with restrained accents; sub-brands may extend palettes while preserving corporate coherence.

typography.secondary_font: Supporting sans-serif for emphasis and readability

layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower third or end of message

preferred_photographers: Lifestyle photographers focused on family and everyday moments
Food photographers emphasizing quality and freshness
Corporate and documentary photographers for sustainability stories
style.camera_feel: Natural, reassuring imagery grounded in real-life contexts.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural interactions, everyday gestures, family and community moments.
style.casting_attitude: Inclusive representation across cultures and life stages.

technical.lighting: Soft natural or diffused studio lighting.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Clear packaging and product recognition prioritized.

visual_dos: Show real people and real food
copy_dos: Align with purpose and shared value

platform_behavior.Instagram: Everyday nutrition stories, brand purpose highlights

print.paper: Standard coated or uncoated corporate stock
print.cover_rules: Clear brand presence with human-centric imagery

logo_misuse_examples: Separating the wordmark from the nest symbol
